When beeps, add the steamed hilsa in Microwave safe bowl, mix well and cover. Press start. Serve with rice.

name: Suji Halwa
steps: In microwave safe glass bowl take suji, add ghee mix it together, select menu, then press start.
When beeps, stir it. Allow to cool. Add sugar and 0.5 qty. of water (For 0.1kg add 150 mL). Mix well, then press start.
When beeps, add remaining 0.5 water, sugar, cashewnuts, kishmish, kesar, elaichi powder, mix it well, then press start. Serve hot.

name: Besan Ladoo
steps: In Microwave safe flat glass dish take besan and ghee. Select menu and weight, then press start.
When beeps, stir it, then press start.
Again when beeps, stir it, then press start.
Allow to cool. Add powdered sugar and elaichi powder. Mix it well and make a ladoo of same size.NoteFor binding the ladoo use ghee
For binding the ladoo use ghee
notes: For binding the ladoo use ghee

name: Shahi Tukda
steps: Arrange bread slices on low rack. Select menu and weight, then press start.
When beeps, turn slices press start.
When beeps, mix Condensed Milk (Milkmaid), milk, sugar, dry fruits and kesar elaichi powder in Microwave Safe Flat Glass Dish. Pour the mixture on slices, then press start. Serve hot.

name: Kheer
steps: In Microwave Safe Glass Bowl add milk, Condensed Milk (Milkmaid) and mix well. Select menu, then press start.
When beeps, add badam, pista pieces, kesar rlaichi powder and seviyaan. Mix well, then press start..
When beeps, mix it well. Add more milk (if required), then press start. Stand for 5 minutes. Serve hot or chilled.NoteThe bowl should be filled at 1/4 level of the total volume.
The bowl should be filled at 1/4 level of the total volume.
notes: The bowl should be filled at 1/4 level of the total volume.

name: Mysore Pak
steps: In a Microwave safe flat glass dish add besan. Select menu and weight, then press start.
When beeps, remove and in another Microwave safe glass bowl add water and sugar. Press start.
When beeps, add sugar to the besan stirring continuously. After this add melted ghee, stirring continuously. Pour the mixture in a Microwave safe flat glass dish. Press start.
Allow to cool. Cut it into square shape pieces and serve.Note: For stirring take the help of one more person.

name: Nariyal Burfi
steps: In a Microwave safe bowl add ghee and fresh grated coconut. Mix well.
Select menu and weight, then press start
When beeps, add Condensed Milk (Milkmaid)), milk powder, elaichi powder, then press start.
When beeps, remove and spread the mixture onto a greased thali and allow to set for 1 hour. Cut into rectangles and store in a air tight container.

name: Sandesh
steps: In a Microwave safe bowl add grated paneer, khoa, rose water and Condensed Milk (Milkmaid). Mix well.
Select menu and weight, then press start.
When beeps, stir well, then press start.
Allow to cool. Hang in Muslin cloth for 20 minutes if it is too wet. Make balls out of the mixture and roll them in elaichi powder and chopped pista. Refrigerate till set.

name: Shahi Rabdi
steps: Dissolve strands of saffron in 2 tbspss lukewarm milk.
In a Microwave safe bowl, put all the ingredients of rabdi except chopped pistachios. Mix well.
Keep the bowl in Microwave. Select menu, then press start.
Serve chilled garnished with chopped pistachios.

name: Payasam
steps: In a Microwave safe bowl take ghee, soaked rice, milk, sugar and water and cover it.
Select menu and weight, then press start.
When beeps, add more milk, dry fruits, kesar, elaichi powder. Mix well, then press start. Stand for 5 minutes. Sprinkle kewada jal on it. Serve hot or chilled.

name: Kaddu Kheer
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add milk and Condensed Milk (Milkmaid), grated kaddu. Select menu, then press start.
When beeps, mix well. Press start.
When beeps, mix well and add dry fruits. Press start. Serve it chilled or hot.

name: Seviyan Zarda
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add sugar and water. Select menu, then press start.
When beeps, add rose essence , cardamom powder, seviyan to the bowl. Press start. Give standing time of 3 minutes. Garnish with almonds and pista and serve.

name: Phirni
steps: Grind the soaked rice to a paste with little water.
In a Microwave safe glass bowl add milk. Select menu and weight, then press start.
When beeps, add rice paste and sugar to it. Press start.
When beeps, add cream and press start
Mix well, add cardamom powder and dry fruits and keep in the refrigerator to chill. Garnish with kesar and serve

name: Burfi
steps: In a bowl mix milk powder, corn flour, Condensed Milk (Milkmaid) and cream. Beat well till smooth..
Pour the mixture in a Microwave safe flat glass dish. Select menu, then press start.
When beeps, mix well (remove lumps if formed). Press start.
When beeps, mix well, then press start.
Remove, allow to cool and refrigerate till set. After setting cut into pieces and and sprinkle chopped almonds and pistas and serve

name: Kalakand
steps: In Microwave Safe Bowl take grated paneer, Condensed Milk (Milkmaid), milk powder, cornflour, Elaichi powder. Mix well, select menu and weight, then press start.
When beeps, mix it again, then press start.
When set cut into pieces. Garnish with dry fruits.

name: Rava Ladoo
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl take sugar and milk. Mix and select menu, then press start.
When beeps, add roasted rava/sooji, kishmish and chopped almonds.Sprinkle elaichi powder and mix very well. Press start.
When beeps, mix well and add grated khoya. Mix well and again press start.
Make equal sized ladoos from the mixture, when it is still warm.

name: Kaju Burfi
steps: Take kaju in a spice-grinder and make a fine powder and keep aside.
In a Microwave safe glass bowl take powdered sugar and water. Stir very well. Select menu, then press start..
When beeps, stir very well and dissolve all the sugar. Add kaju powder and stir till all the lumps are removed. Keep stirring till the paste becomes like a dough (ball formation stage).

Grease the kitchen-slab (marble top) a little with ghee. Take the dough and roll out to 25 mm thickness carefully. Cut the kaju burfi in desired square or diamond shape and decorate with vark and serve.

name: Badam Halwa

rows.ingredient: Badam (soaked in hot water for 1 hour)

steps: Remove the skin from badam and grind them to a fine paste adding milk.Take out this paste in a microwave safe glass bowl.
Add desi ghee to the paste and mix well. Select menu and weight, then press start.
When beeps, stir very well and again press start.

When beeps, stir very well. Add sugar and milk (for cooking). Again mix well, then press start. Give standing time of 5-6 minutes and mix well. Garnish with slivered almonds and serve badam halwa hot.

name: Veg Kebabs
steps: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl. Mix well and shape them into flat kebabs.
Keep the kebabs on high rack and keep in microwave. Select category and press start..
When beeps, turn over the kebabs and press start again.

name: Tea
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add water, tea leaves. Select category and weight. Press start.

When beeps, add milk and sugar. Press start. Serve hot.                                                                                                                                                                               1 cup tea = 150ml approx

name: Coffee
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add water. Select category and weight, then press start.
Meanwhile in each cup add 0.5 tsp coffee (with few water drops ) and sugar. Beat well.
When beeps, add milk to boiling water. Press start.
Add milk to each cup and serve hot.                            1 cup coffee = 150ml approx

name: Masala Tea
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add water, tea leaves and chai masala. Select category and weight. Press start.
When beeps, add milk and sugar. Press start
When beeps, keep it again in microwave and press start for dragging tea.
Serve hot.1 cup tea = 150ml approx

name: Ginger Tea
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add water, tea leaves and crushed ginger. Select category and weight. Press start.
When beeps, add milk and sugar. Press start
When beeps, keep it again in microwave and press start for dragging tea.
Serve hot.1 cup tea = 150ml approx

name: Tulsi Tea
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add water, tea leaves and tulsi leaves. Select category and weight. Press start.
When beeps, add milk and sugar. Press start
When beeps, keep it again in microwave and press start for dragging tea.
Serve hot.1 cup tea = 150ml approx

name: Lemon Tea
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add water, tea leaves. Select category and weight. Press start.
When beeps, add lemon and sugar. Press start. Serve hot.1 cup tea = 150ml approx

name: Black Tea
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add water, tea leaves. Select category and weight. Press start.
When beeps, add sugar. Press start. Serve hot.1 cup tea = 150ml approx

name: Green Tea
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add water, tea leaves. Select category and weight. Press start.
When beeps, add lemon and sugar. Press start. And allow it to for 5 minutes. Serve hot.1 cup tea = 150ml approx

name: Spiced Cider Tea
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add water, cinnamon, cloves, peppercorn and tea leaves. Select category and weight. Press start.
When beeps, add cider and sugar. Press start. And allow it to for 5 minutes. Serve hot.1 cup tea = 150ml approx

name: Peppermint Tea
steps: In a Microwave safe glass bowl add water, green tea leaves. Select category and weight. Press start.
